scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.kill: lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'Killed processes on ports 8000 and 3000'
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
